敀字的基本解释

敀
pò
古同“迫”。
大打。

敀字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bó］
［《廣韻》博陌切，入陌，幫。］
亦作“敀1”。
(1)长兄，兄弟中年最长者。
(2)专称嫡长子，对庶长子称“孟”而言。
(3)泛指排行最大的。参见“伯仲叔季”、“伯兄”、“伯姊”。
(4)父亲的哥哥。
(5)古代妻子对丈夫的称呼。
(6)古代对男性长者的尊称。
(7)用为对父辈亲友的通称。
(8)古代管领一方的长官。
(9)指古代各官署长官所委派的分司之长。
(10)古代五等爵位的第三等。
(11)旧时对以文章或道义而闻名于世，并足以做他人表率者的尊称。
(12)古代祭名。祭祀马神。《诗·小雅·吉日》：“吉日維戊，既伯既禱。”毛传：“伯，馬祖也。重物慎微，將用馬力，必先爲之禱其祖。”朱熹集传：“伯，馬祖也。謂天駟房星之神也。”《尔雅·释天》：“'既伯既禱'，馬祭也。”郭璞注：“伯，祭馬祖也。”一说伯通“禡”。古代行军於所止处祭神。参阅清马瑞辰《毛诗传笺通释》卷十八。
(13)通“白”。显著，显赫。
(14)姓。春秋时楚有伯州犁。见《左传·襄公二十六年》。
[②]［bà］

敀字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　敀； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页469第18
【廣韻】博陌切。與迫同。【說文】作?，迮也。周書曰：常?常任。○按書立政，今本作伯。　又【玉篇】强也。【篇海】附也。　又【廣韻】普伯切，音拍。大打也。

敀字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
敀字的起名意思

暂无。

Zhi
Basic explanation of words
Zhi
pò
Gu Tong "forced".
Hit hard.
Zhi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［bó］
["Guang Yun" Bo Mo cut, enter Mo, help. ]
Also known as "敀1".
(1) The eldest brother, the oldest middle-aged brother.
(2) It is specifically called the eldest son of the concubine, for the eldest son of the concubine is called "Meng".
(3) Generally refers to the largest ranking. See "Bo Zhong Shu Ji", "Big Brother", "Big Sister".
(4) Father's brother.
(5) The name of a wife to her husband in ancient times.
(6) The honorific title for male elders in ancient times.
(7) Used as a general term for relatives and friends of the parents.
(8) The chief governing one party in ancient times.
(9) Refers to the chiefs of the divisions appointed by the chiefs of various bureaus in ancient times.
(10) The third class of the ancient fifth-class titles.
(11) In the old days, it was a respectful name for someone who was famous for his articles or morals, and was enough to be a role model for others.
(12) Ancient sacrificial names. Worship the horse god. "Poetry·Xiaoya·Ji Ri": "Ji Ri Weiwu, both Bo and Pray." Mao Chuan: "Bo, Ma Zu also. Be cautious about heavy things, you will use horsepower, and you must first pray for his ancestors." Zhu Xi Collected Biography : "Bo, Mazu. It is also the god of the heavens and the stars." "Erya Shitian": "'Bo is both praying, and the horse is worshipping." Guo Pu's note: "Bo, offering sacrifices to Mazu." One Said Botong "禡". In ancient times, march to worship the gods wherever it stopped. Refer to the eighteenth volume of Ma Ruichen's "Commentary Notes on Mao Shi Zhuan" in the Qing Dynasty.
(13) Through "white". Significantly, distinguished.
(14) Last name. In the spring and autumn, there was a plow in Bozhou. See "Twenty-Six Years of Zuo Zhuan·Xianggong".
[②]［bà］
Zhi

[Mao Ji 2] [Department of Characters] 　敀; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 469 18
[Guang Yun] Bo Mo cut. Same with forced. [Said the text] For?, you also. Zhou Shu said: Chang? Permanent. ○According to the book to establish politics, this is the uncle.　[Jade articles] Strong again. [Article Sea] Attached too.　[Guangyun] Popeche, sound beat. Great fight too.
